title: Work Day Scheduler
description: The first project we are tackling as a group. Still a work in progress, but I couldn't be prouder of my team!

title: Happy Campers
description: An interactive Work Day Scheduler that will help you plan your work week, and the time blocks will change color, depending on if an event has passed or is still to come.

title: My First Portfolio
description: My first attempt at a portfolio. I have made leaps in 2 weeks, and looking forward to adding to my arsenal

title: Eat-da-Burger
description: Eat-da-Burger is a simple, yet silly app where the user can add burgers, then devour them. Devoured burgers will move from left to right.

title: Gamers Alike
description: Gamers Alike was our brain child for Project 2. Essentially a 'buddy finder' for gamers, that includes a 5-star raing system and also 'Gamer Attributes' to encourage good behavior and promote enjoyable play sessions.

title: Employee Summary
description: An employees database creator, used in the terminal, that will prompt the user about their staff. once the employees are assigned their roles, the app will create an HTML file that neatly organizes the information gathered by the user. Employee Summary runs in VS Code, no deployed site available.
